short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rewrite popular websites to mirror sites that will track you a little less

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Many popular websites have extensive tracking on them. This extension allows use to easily and automatically redirect to a mirror or alternative site with the same content and functionality but with a little less tracking.
